title.value: Анализ рынка комплексных водорастворимых удобрений Республики Беларусь, перспективных для использования в интенсивных технологиях возделывания яблони (аналитический обзор)
The analysis of a market of complex water-soluble fertilizers of the Republic of Belarus, perspective for use in intensive technologies of apple-trees growing (analytical review)
The analysis of a market of complex water-soluble fertilizers of the Republic of Belarus, perspective for use in intensive technologies of apple-trees growing (analytical review)

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Brujlo, A.S., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: The article is dedicated to a short analysis of the part of the complex water-soluble fertilizers market with good prospects in the use of intensive technologies of apple cultivation in the soil-climatic conditions of the Republic of Belarus. In virtue of the analysis of water-soluble complexes of macro- and microelements according to their element composition, particular elements' pretense, their balance, solubility, insoluble remains, price, apple-tree needs in nutritional elements in different phases of their growth and development the choice of trademarks and the forms of water-soluble fertilizers with good prospects for their foliar application in intensive technologies of apple cultivation is settled down. In the course of the study there was presented a list an characteristic of complex water-soluble fertiklizers wich could be efficient for use in horticultural business enterprises. It was proposed to realize foliar application of macro- and microfertilizers in combined application in doses 0.3-0.5 up to 1-2% depending on trace element content in certain forms of water soluble fertilizers.
